des:
“Verily in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.” Quran 13:28
It's no secret that listening to the Quran reduces stress and has a healing effect on the heart. At Quran for the Heart radio you can listen to beautiful Quran Recitations 24hrs without interruptions. 

Disclaimer: The skill Content is in Arabic.
